source:
TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_SEQ_00Mayaru Moyaru looks eager to regale you about all there is to know of the latest Moonfire Faire.
※This quest is available for a limited time only.
target:
TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_SEQ_00* Cette quête est un événement à durée limitée.

Mayaru Moyaru brûle d'impatience de vous parler des Feux de la Mort.

source:
TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_SEQ_01Noticing the sweat on your brow from the summer heat, Mayaru Moyaru motions you to visit Costa del Sol so you can cool down by taking a dip in its serene waters. He implores you to enjoy the Moonfire Faire festivities while you are there, and mentions the return of a mysterious attraction. To learn more, it seems you must speak with his colleague, Haermaga, in the seaside resort.

※Please note that you will be unable to complete this quest after the seasonal event has ended. For details, please check the Lodestone.
target:
TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_SEQ_01Cette quête ne peut être commencée et effectuée que pendant la durée de l'événement saisonnier correspondant. Pour plus de détails, veuillez consulter The Lodestone.

Mayaru Moyaru vous a parlé des Feux de la Mort, qui se déroulent une fois de plus à Costa del Sol, dans la Noscea orientale. Il vous a appris qu'un certain événement faisait son retour cette année, et vous a suggéré d'aller sur place vous adresser à Haermaga afin d'obtenir davantage d'informations.

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_SEQ_02<tab>Haermaga quickly reveals to you that the mysterious returning attraction is none other than the Eorzean Nimble Warrior course─albeit reborn. He mentions that he has a request he wishes to make of you, if you are willing to help. Speak with him again to accept his request.
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_SEQ_02<tab>Vous avez appris que l'attraction en question n'était autre que “Pas dans l'tas le r'voilà”. Pour cette nouvelle édition, Haermaga a sollicité votre aide pour une mission un peu délicate. Faites-lui signe lorsque vous serez prêt<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> à l'aider.

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_SEQ_03<tab>Haermaga's request concerns R'fhul Tia, whom he feels has let his early success get to his head. He wants you to act as a guiding star for the young adventurer, and set him back upon the right path. To do so, you will first need to speak with R'fhul Tia.
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_SEQ_03<tab>Haermaga aimerait que vous touchiez quelques mots à R'fhul Tia, qui semble se surestimer un peu trop en ce moment. Rendez visite à ce dernier.

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_SEQ_04<tab>Both of R'fhul Tia's apprentices introduce themselves to you at his behest. Though he seems quite confident he will succeed in his attempt through the Eorzean Nimble Warrior course, you notice that the two of them and R'majha are worried about him. Proceed to the destination to watch how he performs.
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_SEQ_04<tab>R'fhul Tia vous a présenté ses disciples. Il vous a également confirmé vouloir participer à “Pas dans l'tas le r'voilà”, mais son entourage ne partageait pas réellement son enthousiasme débordant...

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_SEQ_05<tab>R'fhul Tia's attempt ended in failure. After such a fall, he is in dire need of help. Render him aid with all haste.
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_SEQ_05<tab>R'fhul Tia s'est fait prendre dans une explosion et s'est vu obligé de quitter la compétition. Allez le secourir.

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_SEQ_06<tab>R'fhul Tia's apprentices do not mince words in expressing their disappointment with him, and shortly thereafter take their leave. He cannot seem to understand what he did wrong, but fortunately for him, he still has you.
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_SEQ_06<tab>Les disciples du jeune Miqo'te, déçus par son attitude, ont décidé de lui tourner le dos. Ce dernier n'a cependant pas compris la raison de leur départ... Comme Haermaga vous a prié<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> de prendre en charge le garçon intrépide, restez encore un peu à ses côtés.

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Haermaga in Costa del Sol.
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_TODO_00<tab>Parler à Haermaga, à Costa del Sol

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Haermaga again.
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_TODO_01<tab>Reparler à Haermaga

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_TODO_02<tab>Speak with R'fhul Tia.
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_TODO_02<tab>Parler à R'fhul Tia

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_TODO_04<tab>Aid R'fhul Tia.

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_MAYARUMOYARU_000_000<tab>Ah, hello, hello! Just the adventurer I was looking for. Feeling the heat? Well, nothing like a good swim in Costa del Sol to cool down─and while you're there, you might as well enjoy the Moonfire festivities!
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_MAYARUMOYARU_000_000<tab>Oh, mais c'est notre <var 08 E905 ((chère)) ((cher)) /var> aventuri<var 08 E905 ((ère)) ((er)) /var><var 1D /var>! Ça chauffe par ici, et quoi de plus normal<var 1D /var>! C'est la saison des Feux de la Mort, héhé<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_MAYARUMOYARU_000_001<tab>Hello there! You look to me like an adventurer who can enjoy a good festival when they see one. And if I may say so myself, the Moonfire Faire is the finest of them in all of Eorzea!
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_MAYARUMOYARU_000_001<tab><var 08 E3E90C0D ((<var 08 E3E90C05 ((Bonsoir)) ((Bonjour)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E3E90C12 ((Bonjour)) ((Bonsoir)) /var>)) /var>, aventuri<var 08 E905 ((ère)) ((er)) /var><var 1D /var>! Mon petit doigt me dit que vous appréciez les festivals<var 1D /var>! Vous tombez bien, regardez comme ça chauffe par ici<var 1D /var>! Et quoi de plus normal<var 1D /var>! C'est la saison des Feux de la Mort, héhé<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_MAYARUMOYARU_000_002<tab>The faire has served to promote the Adventurers' Guild in recent years, and I expect plenty of folks'll join the fun this summer─no one will want to miss the exciting show we're putting on.
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_MAYARUMOYARU_000_002<tab>D'ailleurs, il fait tellement chaud que je vais vous épargner l'historique de la fête et entrer im<var 16 /var>mé<var 16 /var>dia<var 16 /var>te<var 16 /var>ment dans le vif du sujet. Au cas où vous ne seriez pas au courant, notre événement est devenu une plate-forme de choix pour la promotion de la guilde des aventuriers.

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_MAYARUMOYARU_000_003<tab>That's right─due to popular demand and the wishes of Master Gegeruju himself, we brought back <var 1A 02 /var>the challenge<var 1A 01 /var>!
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_MAYARUMOYARU_000_003<tab>Et cette année signe le retour d'une attraction que les festivaliers réclament à cor et à cri<var 1D /var>! Va y avoir le feu<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_MAYARUMOYARU_000_004<tab>Intrigued, aren't you? Sate your curiosity by speaking with Haermaga in Costa del Sol!
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_MAYARUMOYARU_000_004<tab>Je sais que ça vous intrigue, c'est écrit sur votre front<var 1D /var>! Rejoignez Haermaga à Costa del Sol, si vous désirez plus d'ex<var 16 /var>pli<var 16 /var>ca<var 16 /var>tions.

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_MAYARUMOYARU_000_005<tab>Look for Haermaga on the Isle of Endless Summer at Costa del Sol. He can tell you everything you need to know!
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_MAYARUMOYARU_000_005<tab>Haermaga se trouve à Costa del Sol, près de l'île de l'Éternel été. N'hésitez pas à lui parler si vous allez sur place<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_HAERMAGA_000_010<tab>Ah, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, here at last! You're here to give <var 1A 02 /var>the challenge<var 1A 01 /var> a whirl, aren't you? That hulking monstrosity erected upon the shore...
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_HAERMAGA_000_010<tab>Je savais que tu viendrais, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var><var 1D /var>! T'es là pour la fameuse attraction toi aussi, pas vrai<var 1D /var>? T'as vu cette structure près de la plage<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_HAERMAGA_000_011<tab>Welcome to the Moonfire Faire, fair adventurer! You're here to give <var 1A 02 /var>the challenge<var 1A 01 /var> a whirl, aren't you? That hulking monstrosity erected upon the shore...
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_HAERMAGA_000_011<tab>Bienvenue, aventuri<var 08 E905 ((ère)) ((er)) /var><var 1D /var>! T'es là pour la fameuse attraction toi aussi, pas vrai<var 1D /var>? T'as vu cette structure près de la plage<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_HAERMAGA_000_012<tab>The imposing fortress that turns grown men into weeping babes, the crucible which forges the fiercest of warriors or spits out their mangled remains─aye, the Eorzean Nimble Warrior course!
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_HAERMAGA_000_012<tab>Je parle bien sûr de “Pas dans l'tas le r'voilà”, le parcours des héros<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_HAERMAGA_100_012<tab>We've had some issues here and there which prevented us from constructing the course anew for a time, but we made it work this year to satisfy the fierce demand from our patrons.
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_HAERMAGA_100_012<tab>Ça fait un p'tit moment qu'on avait pas pu le mettre en place, mais un bon nombre d'aventuriers et d'aven<var 16 /var>tu<var 16 /var>rières avaient hâte de le retrouver, alors il est de retour<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_HAERMAGA_000_013<tab>It hasn't merely returned, however─oh no, it's been updated and refined with a new circuit. I daresay it's a course...reborn!
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_HAERMAGA_000_013<tab>Mais attention, c'est plus qu'un simple retour. T'auras droit à de nouvelles sensations fortes grâce à l'ajout d'un parcours inédit<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_HAERMAGA_000_014<tab>While the new circuit isn't physically demanding, it's no less a spectacle. We recruited the finest Gold Saucer technicians and a certain bomb expert to craft so many bombs into the new attraction, it feels like a damned volcano's erupting when they go off!
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_HAERMAGA_000_014<tab>Il est moins sportif que le précédent, mais va pas croire que c'est joué d'avance. Un tas d'explosifs développés par un ingénieur du Gold Saucer et un certain spécialiste des bombos ont été placés sur le chemin<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_HAERMAGA_000_015<tab>Aye, 'tis a trial that tests the resolve of fledgling and experienced adventurers alike, as all are forced to not only calculate the timing of the impending explosions, but avoid the shockwaves that follow them too. If you think you're up to the task, then by all means, show everyone how it's done!
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_HAERMAGA_000_015<tab>Va falloir faire attention au rythme des explosions et au souffle qu'elles produisent. Tous tes talents d'aventuri<var 08 E905 ((ère)) ((er)) /var> seront mis à rude épreuve<var 1D /var>! Lance-toi donc si tu t'en sens capable<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_HAERMAGA_100_015<tab>Heh, you look eager to try your hand at it despite all the risks. And yet I don't get the sense that you're underestimating the challenge before you either... <sigh> It would do the young lad good to see the temperament of a veteran like yourself. Would that he could learn from your example...
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_HAERMAGA_100_015<tab>Haha, on brûle de motivation à ce que je vois<var 1D /var>! Mais au moins, t'es pas <var 08 E905 ((une)) ((un)) /var> casse-cou comme l'autre, là... (soupire). Si seulement il pouvait prendre exemple sur toi...

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_HAERMAGA_000_016<tab>Ah, it's nothing─just, this talk about the course in all its newfound glory brought to mind a certain worrisome adventurer.
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_HAERMAGA_000_016<tab>Oh, c'est rien, je repensais juste à un de nos par<var 16 /var>ti<var 16 /var>ci<var 16 /var>pants. J'dois dire que son cas me rassure pas des masses...

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_HAERMAGA_100_016<tab>...Hm.
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_HAERMAGA_100_016<tab>Mmh...

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_HAERMAGA_000_017<tab>Look, you wouldn't mind lending me a hand with something, would you? When you're not busy running the course, naturally. Give me a shout after this if you're interested.
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_HAERMAGA_000_017<tab>J'aimerais te confier une mission. Reviens me voir quand tu auras un peu de temps à me consacrer.

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_HAERMAGA_000_020<tab>You'll lend a hand then? You have my gratitude. The matter in question is in regards to a certain new...ah, I suppose he isn't new anymore. Well, anyway, I want you to act as a model of sorts for a certain young adventurer.
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_HAERMAGA_000_020<tab>Je te remercie pour ton aide. Tu vois, y'a un p'tit débutant à qui j'aimerais que tu serves de modèle. Enfin, il débute plus vraiment, mais bref...

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_HAERMAGA_000_021<tab>He's no stranger to you of course─recall a fellow by the name of R'fhul Tia? Came to the Moonfire Faire with his little sister R'mahja before, remember? The lad went and became an adventurer, and seems to have some experience under his belt now, but...
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_HAERMAGA_000_021<tab>Tu le connais aussi, c'est R'fhul Tia. Il était avec sa petite sœur, R'majha, tu t'en souviens<var 1D /var>? Il a gagné un peu d'expérience depuis l'autre fois, mais y a un problème.

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_HAERMAGA_000_022<tab>The lad's name is R'fhul Tia. Comes to the Moonfire Faire regularly with his little sister R'mahja, and seems to be a well-meaning fellow for the most part. Recently, though...
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_HAERMAGA_000_022<tab>Il s'appelle R'fhul Tia. Il vient souvent aux Feux de la Mort avec sa petite sœur, R'majha. C'est un type bien, mais y a un problème.

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_HAERMAGA_000_023<tab>Well, to be frank, he's putting on airs. You'd better see him for yourself to get the real picture. I saw him heading to the north of the island with his sister earlier─you should be able to find him there.
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_HAERMAGA_000_023<tab>En clair, il s'y croit un peu trop. M'enfin, va le voir directement, ça sera plus simple. Il devrait être au nord de l'île avec sa sœur.

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_HAERMAGA_000_024<tab>While he has his issues, there's no doubt in my mind that he has a promising future as an adventurer. I'll leave it up to you to decide how you want to go about it, but guide him back onto the right path, would you?
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_HAERMAGA_000_024<tab>C'est vraiment une tête brûlée, mais il a de l'avenir, j'en doute pas. Tu peux t'y prendre comme tu veux, mais fais-le revenir sur le droit chemin. Je compte sur toi.

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_HAERMAGA_000_025<tab>R'fhul Tia should be somewhere on the north side of the island. How you go about it is up to you─just guide him back onto the right path.
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_HAERMAGA_000_025<tab>R'fhul Tia est au nord de l'île. Tu peux t'y prendre comme tu veux, mais remets-le sur le droit chemin. Je compte sur toi.

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_RMAJHA_000_026<tab>I begged my brother to bring me again this year, I just love it sooo much! And it's even more fun because he's with me!
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_RMAJHA_000_026<tab>J'adorrre les Feux de la Mort<var 1D /var>! Mon grand frère a accepté de m'emmener avec lui, je suis trop contente<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_ADVENTURERA04540_000_027<tab>W-Wait a minute, you're...I can't believe this, you're like one of my heroes!
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_ADVENTURERA04540_000_027<tab>Hé, mais vous êtes... Ça alors, c'est vraiment vous<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_ADVENTURERB04540_000_028<tab>Well, this is a pleasant surprise. Our mentor predicted you would join the festivities.
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_ADVENTURERB04540_000_028<tab>Eh bien, quelle surprise. Il avait raison en disant que vous participeriez aux Feux de la Mort.

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_RFHULTIA_000_030<tab>Long time no see, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! I had a feeling we'd meet again. Don't be shy now, Majha!
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_RFHULTIA_000_030<tab>J'avais hâte de vous revoir, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var><var 1D /var>! C'est un vrai plaisir<var 1D /var>! Majha, dis <var 08 E3E90C0D ((<var 08 E3E90C05 ((bonsoirrr)) ((bonjourrr)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E3E90C12 ((bonjourrr)) ((bonsoirrr)) /var>)) /var>.

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_RMAJHA_000_031<tab>Hello, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! I'm so happy you're here. Today just keeps getting better and better!
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_RMAJHA_000_031<tab><var 08 E3E90C0D ((<var 08 E3E90C05 ((Bonsoirrr)) ((Bonjourrr)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E3E90C12 ((Bonjourrr)) ((Bonsoirrr)) /var>)) /var>, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var><var 1D /var>! Hihi, je suis super contente de vous revoir, moi aussi<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_RFHULTIA_000_032<tab>Ah, might you be <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>? It's an honor to finally meet you! O-Oh, and this right here is my little sister!
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_RFHULTIA_000_032<tab>Hé, vous seriez pas <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, par hasarrrd<var 1D /var>!? J-je suis fan de vous<var 1D /var>! Oh, laissez-moi vous présenter ma petite sœur<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_RMAJHA_000_033<tab>Pleased to meet you, <var 08 E905 ((Miss)) ((Mister)) /var> Adventurer! My name is R'majha! Will you be playing with us today?
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_RMAJHA_000_033<tab>Enchantée<var 1D /var>! Je m'appelle R'majha<var 1D /var>! J'espère qu'on s'entendrrra bien<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_RFHULTIA_000_034<tab>Since you're here, there's something I want to tell you... Though I've only been an adventurer for a few summers, I've already made a name for myself. Hells, I even have a pair of apprentices!
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_RFHULTIA_000_034<tab>En fait, j'attendais votre venue pour vous annoncer une grande nouvelle... Je suis plus un débutant, maintenant<var 1D /var>! Je m'occupe même d'autrrres aventuriers.

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_RFHULTIA_100_034<tab>I suppose you'd expect as much for someone of my obvious talent, eh?
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_RFHULTIA_100_034<tab>Mais quoi de plus norrrmal, vu ma fulgurante progression<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_RFHULTIA_000_035<tab>Anyway, where was I? Oh, right─my apprentices. Go on, introduce yourselves!
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_RFHULTIA_000_035<tab>Laissez-moi vous présenter mes cherrrs disciples.

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_ADVENTURERA04540_000_036<tab>Hello there, friend! The pair of us are just your average friendly ol' novice adventurers who wound up taking up an apprenticeship under our mentor here after he saved us from a sticky situation─he's a big fan of yours, by the way!
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_ADVENTURERA04540_000_036<tab>On est encore de simples novices. Depuis que le boss nous a sauvés, il nous a pris sous son aile en tant que disciples<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_ADVENTURERA04540_100_036<tab>The mentor we respect respects you, so if you really think about it, we ought to respect you too! And anyone who commands that much respect is clearly incredible. It's an honor, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((sir)) /var>─truly!
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_ADVENTURERA04540_100_036<tab>Il n'a jamais eu que votre nom à la bouche<var 1D /var>! C'est un honneur de vous rencontrer<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_ADVENTURERB04540_000_037<tab>I've heard all kinds of amazing rumors about you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. It's a pleasure to finally make your acquaintance.
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_ADVENTURERB04540_000_037<tab>Héhé... J'ai beaucoup entendu parler de vous. Ravie de vous rencontrer, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_RFHULTIA_000_038<tab>So, I take it you also heard about <var 1A 02 /var>the challenge<var 1A 01 /var> and decided to join in the festivities?
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_RFHULTIA_000_038<tab>Et donc... Vous êtes là pourrr cette fameuse attraction, je suppose<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_RFHULTIA_100_038<tab>I won't lie, I'm itching to give the course a go myself! I hear they've even added a new bombastic circuit to it. Though, for a prodigy like me who completed it as a novice...
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_RFHULTIA_100_038<tab>Héhé... J'ai hâte de participer à “Pas dans l'tas le r'voilà”<var 1D /var>! Y a un nouveau parcours, mais j'ai rien à craindre<var 1D /var>! Après tout, j'ai réussi le précédent alorrrs que j'étais un petit nouveau.

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_RFHULTIA_000_039<tab>The real challenge'll be not to fall asleep from boredom. Heh, a rising star like me has nowhere to go but up, after all!
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_RFHULTIA_000_039<tab>Je vais terrrminer ça les doigts dans le nez, même sans m'y mettre à fond<var 1D /var>! Vous verrez tous à quel point j'ai la classe<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_Q1_000_000<tab>Que dites-vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_A1_000_001<tab>Good luck.
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_A1_000_001<tab>Bon courage.

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_A1_000_002<tab>You could try, you know, not being cocky as well?
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_A1_000_002<tab>Tu te surestimes un peu, non<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_A1_000_003<tab>...You've completed the course before?
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_A1_000_003<tab>Je ne me souviens pas t'avoir déjà vu réussir.

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_RFHULTIA_000_040<tab>Heh, I appreciate the sentiment, but I'll be fine. It'll be easy enough to dazzle the audience.
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_RFHULTIA_000_040<tab>Héhé, pas la peine de m'encourager. J'ai pas besoin de ça pour terminer le parcourrrs à la perfection<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_RFHULTIA_000_041<tab>Still, it's an honor to be encouraged by the person I look up to─thank you!
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_RFHULTIA_000_041<tab>Oh, mais je vous remercie quand même<var 1D /var>! Je suis super heureux d'être soutenu par <var 08 E905 ((celle)) ((celui)) /var> que j'admirrre<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_RFHULTIA_000_042<tab>Nonsense, I'm being confident, not cocky! It just comes naturally to me─I guess this is what happens when you become a respectable adventurer, eh?
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_RFHULTIA_000_042<tab>Mais non, avoir confiance en soi, c'est tout naturrrel pour un aventurier<var 1D /var>! Tant mieux si ça se voit<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_RFHULTIA_000_043<tab>Watch me out there, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. When I tear through that course, you'll understand what I'm capable of!
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_RFHULTIA_000_043<tab>Regarrrdez-moi bien, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Je vais vous en mettre plein les yeux<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_RFHULTIA_000_044<tab>Wh-What are you saying, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! And in front of my impressionable apprentices no less! You should be well aware of my historic achievement!
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_RFHULTIA_000_044<tab>D-d-dites pas n'importe quoi<var 1D /var>! Surtout pas devant mes disciples<var 1D /var>! Vous m'avez vu m'en sortirrr, et avec classe<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_RFHULTIA_000_045<tab>Make no mistake, I've completed the course. The old me who made one blunder after another is gone. You'll see, just watch!
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_RFHULTIA_000_045<tab>Je suis vraiment venu à bout du parcours. Cette personne lamentable qui échouait existe plus. Allez, c'est parrrti<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_RMAJHA_000_046<tab>Are you sure you're okay, Fhul? You've been acting odd lately...
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_RMAJHA_000_046<tab>Fhul, t'es sûrrr que ça va aller...<var 1D /var>? T'es bizarre en ce moment...

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_RFHULTIA_000_047<tab>Am I okay? Hah! I'm better than ever. Don't you worry one bit, Mahjaーyour big brother's a fully fledged adventurer now. I'll give the crowd a show and be back before you know it.
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_RFHULTIA_000_047<tab>T'inquiète pas, Majha. J'ai même pas besoin de suer sang et eau pourrr remporter la victoire avec panache<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_FHULTIA_000_048<tab>From the moment I became an adventurer, I've always looked up to you. There's no one I want witnessing my finest achievement more than you, so if you can spare a moment to watch, please wait for me on the beach.
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_FHULTIA_000_048<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, j'aimerais que vous m'observiez relever ce défi avec brio, parce que je vous admirrre plus que quiconque. Venez près de la ligne de départ si vous êtes d'accord<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_RMAJHA_000_049<tab>Fhul...
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_RMAJHA_000_049<tab>Fhul...

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_ADVENTURERA04540_000_050<tab>It'll be okay, Majha. It's your brother after all. He'll pull through, surely...
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_ADVENTURERA04540_000_050<tab>Le boss devrait s'en sortir... Enfin, j'espère...

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_ADVENTURERB04540_000_051<tab>Yes, I'm sure you have nothing to worry about, my dear...
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_ADVENTURERB04540_000_051<tab>Oui, il ne devrait pas y avoir de problème...

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_RMAJHA_000_052<tab>You'll come too, won't you? I'll feel better if you're there!
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_RMAJHA_000_052<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, venez voir mon frrrère avec moi<var 1D /var>! S'il vous plaît<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_HAERMAGA_000_053<tab>Damn you, Beaudefoin...
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_HAERMAGA_000_053<tab>Quel casse-pieds, ce Beaudefoin...

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_HAERMAGA_100_053<tab>...Eh? Ah, it's nothing. Don't concern yourself with my problems. R'fhul needs all the help he can get.
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_HAERMAGA_100_053<tab>Mh...<var 1D /var>? Oh, c'est rien, je parlais tout seul. Je te laisse te charger de R'fhul Tia.

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_RMAJHA_000_054<tab>Fhul... I really hope he'll be okay.
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_RMAJHA_000_054<tab>Je m'inquiète pourrr Fhul...

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_ADVENTURERA04540_000_055<tab>It wasn't so long ago─the day R'fhul rescued us, I mean. We didn't know left from right, but still thought we had the chops to take on a rampaging beast. We'd have died had R'fhul, who happened to be passing by, not put his life on the line for us.
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_ADVENTURERA04540_000_055<tab>Quand nous venions à peine de nous lancer à l'aventure, le boss nous a sauvés des griffes d'un dangereux monstre en risquant sa propre vie.

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_ADVENTURERA04540_100_055<tab>Thinking back on it, the way he fought was downright clumsy─even to my eyes. But I will never forget how desperately he fought to save us... He showed us what it truly means to be an adventurer.
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_ADVENTURERA04540_100_055<tab>Maintenant que j'y repense, ses attaques étaient assez maladroites, mais en le voyant tout donner pour nous secourir, on s'est dit qu'il avait vraiment la classe.

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_ADVENTURERA04540_110_055<tab>That's why we decided to follow him. I know he'll do his best out there today, because that's the kind of man he is!
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_ADVENTURERA04540_110_055<tab>C'est pour ça qu'on a voulu le suivre. Je suis sûr qu'il se montrera tout aussi investi pendant son parcours<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_ADVENTURERB04540_000_056<tab>Recently, R'fhul's been... Sorry. Forget I said anything.
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_ADVENTURERB04540_000_056<tab>R'fhul Tia est... Non, ce n'est rien. Oubliez.

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_RMAJHA_000_060<tab>Do you see my brother? I can't see anything from here...
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_RMAJHA_000_060<tab>Mh... Le parrrcours est vraiment gigantesque... Où est Fhul<var 1D /var>? Je suis trop petite, je vois rien...

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_BEAUDEFOIN_000_061<tab>(-???-)Aha, I sense a damsel in distress! Fear not, young maiden, for we are here to the rescue!
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_BEAUDEFOIN_000_061<tab>(-???-)Haha<var 1D /var>! On se charge de vous tenir au courant<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_BEAUDEFOIN_000_062<tab>(-Beaudefoin-)Ahem... Let the games begin! I, Beaudefoin, will humbly serve as herald of the proceedings.
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_BEAUDEFOIN_000_062<tab>(-Beaudefoin, gentil commentateur-)Ahem... Vous l'attentiez tous<var 1D /var>! “Pas dans l'tas le r'voilà” va enfin commencer<var 1D /var>! Je suis Beaudefoin, votre gentil commentateur.

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_HAERMAGA_000_063<tab>(-Haermaga-)<sigh> ...And I, Haermaga, have been unjustly nominated to assist him.
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_HAERMAGA_000_063<tab>(-Haermaga, gentil organisateur-)Haa... Et moi Haermaga, votre gentil organisateur...

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_BEAUDEFOIN_000_064<tab>(-Beaudefoin-)Together, not even the slightest happening shall escape our ardent observation!
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_BEAUDEFOIN_000_064<tab>(-Beaudefoin, gentil commentateur-)Nous vous relaterons les événements du parcours en direct<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_BEAUDEFOIN_100_064<tab>(-Beaudefoin-)Now then, let us look upon our contestant, the up-and-coming adventurer R'fhul Tia! With such a daunting trial before him, who knows what could be running through his mind right now. What do those stern blue eyes of yours see, Haermaga?
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_BEAUDEFOIN_100_064<tab>(-Beaudefoin, gentil commentateur-)Voyons comment se porte R'fhul Tia, notre participant. Haermaga, je te laisse la parole.

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_HAERMAGA_000_065<tab>(-Haermaga-)The lad looks eager to get up and at it, and in terms of physique, he looks to be in fine shape. That said, I can't help but notice some nervous energy in him as well.
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_HAERMAGA_000_065<tab>(-Haermaga, gentil organisateur-)Il est motivé et bouge plutôt bien. Je dirais qu'il est en parfaite condition. Cependant, il semble légèrement tendu...

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_BEAUDEFOIN_000_066<tab>(-Beaudefoin-)Thank you, Haermaga. Let's wish him the best of luck out─ Ah! The contestant has just took off at a run, and is presently making his way to the first jet of water!
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_BEAUDEFOIN_000_066<tab>(-Beaudefoin, gentil commentateur-)Merci. J'espère qu'il donnera le meilleur de lui-même. Ah<var 1D /var>! Il s'est élancé vers le petit geyser<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_BEAUDEFOIN_000_067<tab>(-Beaudefoin-)And he soars through the sky expertly! Wow, just look at that landing!
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_BEAUDEFOIN_000_067<tab>(-Beaudefoin, gentil commentateur-)Il se laisse porter par le jet d'eau<var 1D /var>! Et son atterissage est... parfaiiit<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_HAERMAGA_000_068<tab>(-Haermaga-)A splendid feat indeed. He managed it all without losing his footing. This is proof of his experience as an adventurer─he's well accustomed to moving under pressure─or above it, as it were.
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_HAERMAGA_000_068<tab>Il n'y a rien à redire sur sa forme, il a atterri avec splendeur. Il faut dire que le bougre a pas mal d'expérience... Il sait se débrouiller.

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_BEAUDEFOIN_000_069<tab>(-Beaudefoin-)And now, he is faced with a decision that will change the course of his fate. Does he take the tried-and-true path, or try his luck at the new circuit...
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_BEAUDEFOIN_000_069<tab>(-Beaudefoin, gentil commentateur-)Le voici maintenant à l'embranchement entre l'ancien et le nouveau parcours...

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_BEAUDEFOIN_100_069<tab>(-Beaudefoin-)Which route do you think our sprightly contender will take, Haermaga?
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_BEAUDEFOIN_100_069<tab>(-Beaudefoin, gentil commentateur-)Que penses-tu qu'il va choisir, Haermaga<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_HAERMAGA_000_070<tab>(-Haermaga-)The new circuit requires a contestant to be calm and collected in the face of a looming barrage of bombs. Unfortunately, I sense much fear in this one. If I were in his shoes, I would pick the old circuit without a second thought...
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_HAERMAGA_000_070<tab>(-Haermaga, gentil organisateur-)Le nouveau parcours demande de garder son sang-froid face aux nombreuses explosions. Cependant, le zèle de notre participant reste un peu inquiétant. Je pense qu'il choisira l'ancien parcours, plus avantageux pour lui.

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_BEAUDEFOIN_000_071<tab>(-Beaudefoin-)Ah, he's on the move! It seems he's made his decision: the new circuit! The timing of his movements leave much to be desired, however...
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_BEAUDEFOIN_000_071<tab>(-Beaudefoin, gentil commentateur-)Ah, il se remet en route<var 1D /var>! Contre toute attente, il a choisi le nouveau parcours<var 1D /var>! Mais malheureusement...

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_HAERMAGA_000_072<tab>(-Haermaga-)Even the slightest moment's hesitation could lead to a messy result, and I fear he teetered for too long... Cover your eyes folks, this could get ugly.
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_HAERMAGA_000_072<tab>(-Haermaga, gentil organisateur-)Il a douté un instant et manqué le bon moment pour avancer. Ça risque de mal tourner.

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_BEAUDEFOIN_000_073<tab>(-Beaudefoin-)He managed to dodge the first explosion! And the second, the third, and the─
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_BEAUDEFOIN_000_073<tab>(-Beaudefoin, gentil commentateur-)Il est parvenu à éviter la première explosion<var 1D /var>! Ainsi que la deuxième, la troisième, et...

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_BEAUDEFOIN_100_073<tab>(-Beaudefoin-)Gods be good, the shockwave of the fourth explosion has sent him flying like a shooting star!
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_BEAUDEFOIN_100_073<tab>(-Beaudefoin, gentil commentateur-)Aaah, il n'a pas pu éviter la quatrième<var 1D /var>! Il a été violemment projeté en l'air<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_BEAUDEFOIN_000_074<tab>(-Beaudefoin-)Ladies and gentlemen, even as the seawater salts his wounds, I regret to inform you that our contestant has been disqualified!
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_BEAUDEFOIN_000_074<tab>(-Beaudefoin, gentil commentateur-)Et... il est malheureusement disqualifié<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_RMAJHA_000_075<tab>No, no, no, this is bad! This is really, really bad!
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_RMAJHA_000_075<tab>Oh là là, c'est terrible<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_BEAUDEFOIN_000_076<tab>(-Beaudefoin-)Well, there goes our audience. This seems as fine a place as any to end the commentary. Please, go. R'fhul needs your help.
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_BEAUDEFOIN_000_076<tab>Bon, maintenant que notre public est parti, fini les commentaires. Va donc aider R'fhul Tia.

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_HAERMAGA_000_077<tab>(-Haermaga-)Right. I hope you haven't forgotten my request. I'm counting on you.
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_HAERMAGA_000_077<tab>J'espère que tu me rendras le service que je t'ai demandé<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_HAERMAGA_000_078<tab>Blast that Beaudefoin, the wily little bastard. I told him hundreds of times I'm not interested in this nonsense, but he still managed to get his way in the end... Er, mind if I ask what you thought of my─you know what, never mind. I don't want to know...
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_HAERMAGA_000_078<tab>T'imagines pas à quel point Beaudefoin m'agace<var 1D /var>! J'ai eu beau lui dire non, il m'a pas laissé le choix. Sinon, ils étaient...<var 1D /var>? Euh, non, rien.

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_BEAUDEFOIN_000_079<tab>I leave the matter of R'fhul Tia's rescue in your capable hands!
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_BEAUDEFOIN_000_079<tab>Héhé, va à la rescousse de R'fhul Tia<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_RMAJHA_100_080<tab>Fhul! Are you hurt?
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_RMAJHA_100_080<tab>Fhul, ça va<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_ADVENTURERA04540_100_080<tab>Not like this, R'fhul...not like this.
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_ADVENTURERA04540_100_080<tab>Boss... Je m'en doutais...

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_ADVENTURERB04540_100_080<tab>I had my suspicions, but I hoped they wouldn't prove to be true...
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_ADVENTURERB04540_100_080<tab>Voilà la triste réalité...

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_RFHULTIA_000_080<tab>I-I owe you one, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>...
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_RFHULTIA_000_080<tab>Je vous en dois une, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>...

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_RFHULTIA_000_081<tab>Ah, lest you all misunderstand, that wasn't a <var 1A 02 /var>serious<var 1A 01 /var> attempt. If I really wanted to complete the course, I could've done it with my hands behind my back!
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_RFHULTIA_000_081<tab>Oh, vous inquiétez pas<var 1D /var>! “Pas dans l'tas”, c'est qu'un jeu, j'étais pas sérrrieux<var 1D /var>! Si je m'y mettais vraiment, je pourrais le terminer sans problème<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_RFHULTIA_000_082<tab>But it'd hardly be entertaining if I just finished it in an instant. There's no drama. Now, when I go back and complete it with ease, the crowd'll go wild! Genius, eh?
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_RFHULTIA_000_082<tab>Mais ce serait pas drôle, vous croyez pas<var 1D /var>? Je suis un vrai aven<var 16 /var>tu<var 16 /var>rrrier, je vais pas me morfondre. Allez, cette fois je vais y arriver en toute beauté<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_ADVENTURERA04540_000_083<tab>Wait a minute, R'fhul... Is that what you really care about? If so, you're not the person I thought you were─the person I respected.
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_ADVENTURERA04540_000_083<tab>Attends... Tu penses vraiment ce que tu dis, là<var 1D /var>? Si c'est le cas, je suis déçu. Celui qu'on admirait était com<var 16 /var>plè<var 16 /var>te<var 16 /var>ment différent...

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_RFHULTIA_000_084<tab>Oh, uh, erm, I mean... I'm not just your average adventurer, you know? I need to amaze everyone!
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_RFHULTIA_000_084<tab>Hein<var 1D /var>? Euh, c'est que, je... Tout grand aventurier doit agirrr avec classe, non<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_ADVENTURERB04540_000_085<tab>No, R'fhul... You're wrong. I guess you never understood what we admired about you. I'm sorry...but this is farewell.
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_ADVENTURERB04540_000_085<tab>Tu te trompes... Ce n'est pas simplement pour ta prestance qu'on te suivait. C'est dommage, mais nos chemins se séparent ici. Adieu.

source: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_RFHULTIA_000_086<tab>Wh-What... What did I do wrong!?
target: TEXT_FESSUM801_04540_RFHULTIA_000_086<tab>Quoi<var 1D /var>? Non... Pourrrquoi<var 1D /var>!?
